original_text: And the priest shall throw the blood on the altar of the Lord at the entrance of the tent of meeting and burn the fat for a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 피를 회막 문 여호와의 제단에 뿌리고 그 기름을 불살라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새가 되게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall throw the blood
on the altar of the Lord
at the entrance of the tent of meeting
for a pleasing aroma to the Lord
